alien4cloud.dao

Interface IGenericSearchDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IGenericIdDAO
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ESGenericSearchDAO

    public interface IGenericSearchDAO
extends IGenericIdDAO
    A Dao that supports search and/or filter based queries.

    • Method Summary

      • count

        <T> long count(Class<T> clazz,
               org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder query)
        Count the number of objects in the index in which a given class lies. The result is not limited to the actual given type.
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class of the object. This is used to retrieve the index on which to perform the count. The current query do not query only the given type but all object in the index.
        query - Additional query.
        Returns:
        The number of objects in the index in which the given class lies (Note some other types may lies in the same index and be counted also.

      • count

        <T> long count(Class<T> clazz,
               String searchText,
               Map<String,String[]> filters)
        Count the number of objects in the index that matches (based on class name) the given class, search text and filters.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The text of the search request (null to match all).
        filters - The filters to apply to the request.
        Returns:
        The number of objects matching the query.

                                     int from,
                                     int maxElements)
        Run a query build from a QueryHelper.ISearchQueryBuilderHelper.
        Parameters:
        queryHelperBuilder - The query builder that contains the query to run.
        from - Offset from the first result you want to fetch.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:

      • search

        <T> GetMultipleDataResult<T> search(Class<T> clazz,
                                    String searchText,
                                    Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                    int maxElements)
        Search for data.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult instance that contains the result data. Empty instance if no data found.

                                    String searchText,

                                    int from,
                                    int maxElements)

        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        from - Offset from the first result you want to fetch.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.

      • search

        <T> GetMultipleDataResult<T> search(Class<T> clazz,
                                    String searchText,

                                    String fetchContext,
                                    int from,
                                    int maxElements)
        Same as search(Class, String, Map, int), but with pagination supported.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        fetchContext - A fetch context to define a partial response.
        from - Offset from the first result you want to fetch.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult instance that contains the result data. Empty instance if no data found.
        See Also:

      • search

        <T> GetMultipleDataResult<T> search(Class<T> clazz,
                                    String searchText,
                                    Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                    org.elasticsearch.index.query.FilterBuilder customFilter,
                                    String fetchContext,
                                    int from,
                                    int maxElements,
                                    String fieldSort,
                                    boolean sortOrder)
        Same as search(Class, String, Map, int), but with pagination supported.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        fetchContext - A fetch context to define a partial response.
        from - Offset from the first result you want to fetch.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        fieldSort - field to sort on
        sortOrder - order for the sort (false = ascending or true = descending)
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult instance that contains the result data. Empty instance if no data found.
        See Also:
        search(Class, String, Map, int)

      • search

        GetMultipleDataResult<Object> search(String[] searchIndices,
                                     Class<?>[] classes,
                                     String searchText,
                                     Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                     String fetchContext,
                                     int from,
                                     int maxElements)
        Performs a search on the given indices
        Parameters:
        searchIndices - Indices in which to search.
        classes - Classes to search.
        searchText - The text to search for.
        from - start element in the search.
        filters - The filters for the search.
        fetchContext - A fetch context to define a partial response.
        maxElements - Maximum number of elements to get.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult that contains the various elements to get.

                                      String searchText,

        Search for data and get a list of facets if any are configured.
        Parameters:

        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:

      • facetedSearch

        <T> FacetedSearchResult facetedSearch(Class<T> clazz,
                                      String searchText,
                                      Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                      org.elasticsearch.index.query.FilterBuilder customFilter,
                                      String fetchContext,
                                      int from,
                                      int maxElements,
                                      String fieldSort,
                                      boolean sortOrder)
        Same as facetedSearch(Class, String, Map, int), but with pagination supported.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search.
        customFilter - The custom defined filter.
        fetchContext - A fetch context to define a partial response.
        from - Offset from the first result you want to fetch.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        fieldSort - field to sort on
        sortOrder - order for the sort (false = ascending or true = descending)
        Returns:

      • suggestSearch

        GetMultipleDataResult<Object> suggestSearch(String[] searchIndices,
                                            Class<?>[] requestedTypes,
                                            String suggestFieldPath,
                                            String searchPrefix,
                                            String fetchContext,
                                            int from,
                                            int maxElements)
        Perform a suggestion search on a specific field.
        Parameters:
        searchIndices - The indices to search for.
        requestedTypes - The types to include in the query.
        suggestFieldPath - The path to the field for which to manage suggestion.
        searchPrefix - The value of the current prefix for suggestion.
        fetchContext - The fetch context to recover only the required field (Note that this should be simplified to directly use the given field...).
        from - The start index for suggestion (usually 0).
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to retrieve for suggestion.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult that contains data matching the requested suggestion.

      • find

        <T> GetMultipleDataResult<T> find(Class<T> clazz,
                                  Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                  int maxElements)
        find data matching the given type and filters.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult instance that contains the result data.

      • search

        <T> GetMultipleDataResult<T> search(Class<T> clazz,
                                    String searchText,
                                    Map<String,String[]> filters,
                                    Map<String,org.elasticsearch.mapping.FilterValuesStrategy> filterStrategies,
                                    int maxElements)
        Search for data. allowing filter strategy "AND, OR" when multiple values in the filter
        Parameters:
        clazz - The type of data to query.
        searchText - The search text if any.
        filters - The filters for the search or null if no filters.
        filterStrategies - A map containing FilterValuesStrategy. A key correspond to a filter key. for values, see FilterValuesStrategy
        maxElements - The maximum number of elements to return.
        Returns:
        A GetMultipleDataResult instance that contains the result data. Empty instance if no data found.

      • findByIdsWithContext

        <T> List<T> findByIdsWithContext(Class<T> clazz,
                                 String fetchContext,
                                 String... ids)
        Find instances by id, only retrieve specific fields of the object.
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class for which to find an instance.
        ids - array of id of the data to find.
        fetchContext - The fetch context to recover only the required field (Note that this should be simplified to directly use the given field...).
        Returns:
        List of Objects that has the given ids or null if no object matching the request is found.

      • selectPath

        String[] selectPath(String index,
                    Class<?>[] types,
                    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder queryBuilder,
                    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.SortOrder sortOrder,
                    String path,
                    int from,
                    int size)
        Select the list of value for the path
        Parameters:
        index - the index
        types - the types
        queryBuilder - the query to filter
        sortOrder - sort the returned result
        path - the path to select
        from - offset
        size - size
        Returns:
        the list of value for the path

      • selectPath

        String[] selectPath(String index,
                    String[] types,
                    org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder queryBuilder,
                    org.elasticsearch.search.sort.SortOrder sortOrder,
                    String path,
                    int from,
                    int size)

        types - the types
        queryBuilder - the query to filter
        sortOrder - sort the returned result
        path - the path to select
        from - offset
        size - size

      • getClassFromType

        Class<?> getClassFromType(String type)
        Return a class from the given elastic search type.
        Parameters:
        type - The elastic search type.
        Returns:
        The class matching the given type if any, null if no class is matching the type.
